### Events
- Triggered scheduled rebalance to reduce rack-level skew after adding 4 replacement disks in rack R12; moved 62 TB overnight.
- Two snapshot verification failures traced to stale credentials on verifier worker; rotated keys and re-ran checks successfully.
- One disk in stor-a-12 showed rising media errors; proactively replaced and completed rebuild in 6.8 hours.
- Quota hard-block applied to tenant 'analytics-42' after exceeding 15 TB over allotment; coordinated temporary burst allowance and clean-up plan.

### On-Call
- Shift: Priya S. 3 pages. 7 tickets. Status: Stable after disk replacement and verifier key rotation; monitoring hottest nodes >90% and compaction backlog.
